title: Doyogena Manual row sowing of wheat

subtasks: Walk through the greenhouse
Operate drone for aerial inspection
Inspect plants for signs of stress or disease
Check irrigation systems for functionality
Note areas needing fertilizer or pruning
Remove weeds from newly planted rows
Adjust irrigation schedule for transplants
Apply mulch around plants to retain moisture
Operate knife gate to direct crop flow
Control the rotary cutter for efficient cutting
Drive the forklift to stack harvested crops

tasks.task: Patrol the fields for maintenance and safety
subtasks: Check fences for damage and repair
Guard against wildlife intrusion using deterrents
Inspect water channels for blockages
Operate irrigation valves to direct water flow
Check sprinkler systems for proper coverage
Maintain pressure gauges and adjust as needed
Coordinate with on-site staff during honeybee swarms
Implement decontamination procedures for toxin exposure
Arrange for cleanup of debris after storms
Lead local farmers in a workshop on crop rotation
Train new workers on equipment operation and safety
Clean workstations and tools after use
Dispose of waste properly to maintain cleanliness
